snippet: The governor proposed a broad set of education initiatives in his State of the State address, but also talked extensively about the state’s finances.
abstract: Connecticut Governor Dannel P Malloy proposes a broad set of education initiatives, including major changes to teacher tenure, in his second State of the State address.
lead_paragraph: The governor proposed a broad set of education initiatives in his State of the State address, but also talked extensively about the state’s finances.

headline.seo: Malloy Calls for New Teacher Tenure Rules in Hartford Address
headline.main: Malloy Urges New Tenure Rules for Connecticut Teachers
headline.print_headline: Malloy, in Address, Urges New Teacher Tenure Rules
